name: 擒贼先擒王
description:
Welcome to“Cut the head off the snake”, where you will incarnate 5 typical characters, explore the unknown world, in the different styles of the world for thrilling adventure.
Game features:
1. Tension.
You have to beat the boss in the allotted time, but in your actions, time is running out, and in many cases, you are just one second away from success. So you have to use your time wisely.
2. Simple UI,
simple operation we didn't set up many complex or meaningless functions
3. A sense of discovery.
We have many maps, you will see many beautiful scenery.
